nodes.bodyText: The test case, as its name indicated, is intended to test operator restart DURING the managed servers are rolling-restarted. This change made it testing operator restart AFTER the managed servers' rolling-restart completes.

For the rolling restart, first admin pod is restarted and then managed server pods, so here the test waits for the admin pod to be restarted and then restarts operator while the managed servers are getting rolled.
I think that makes sense. thanks.
